name: Mr. Atul Kahate
role: Eminent Speaker in Education and Emerging Technologies
bio: Currently working as a Freelance Computer Science Visiting Faculty, mainly at C-DAC, Pune and DESPU (despu.edu.in) for a range of subjects since April 2022. Have worked with many IT companies (Syntel, American Express, Deutsche Bank, LTI, Oracle), playing roles ranging from Software Developer to Head of Technology Practice. Authored over 80 books. Passionate about technology.

name: Mr. Vivek Sawant
role: Chief Mentor of Maharashtra Knowledge Corporation Limited (MKCL)
bio: Hon. Mr. Vivek Sawant is the Chief Mentor of Maharashtra Knowledge Corporation Limited (MKCL) India since in 2020. ...... Subhash Patil MKCL Nashik
